SEARCH
Package org.codehaus.mojo.versions.ordering

Class DefaultSegmentCounter

java.lang.Object
org.codehaus.mojo.versions.ordering.DefaultSegmentCounter
All Implemented Interfaces:
SegmentCounter
public class DefaultSegmentCounter extends Object implements SegmentCounter
Default implementation of the SegmentCounter interface, using Maven's version rules, i.e. 1.3.34 > 1.3.9 but 1.3.4.3.2.34 < 1.3.4.3.2.9.
